description: Mexican Taco meets Korean BBQ.These food trucks are now counting seven-vending delicious street food  meals on wheels around LA.MexiCalbi is on the cutting edge of Korean –Mexican fusion. We take the highest quality meats, prepared using our authentic Korean marinade fuse them with fresh crisp greens, shredded cheese and wrap it all in a warm fresh Mexican tortilla to create a taste second to none. That in a nutshell is the MexiCalbi way: high quality meats, authentic ingredients – no exception.Hot off the grill your choice of fresh marinated, perfectly seasoned Korean Beef Short Rib, Korean Style Chicken, Korean Spicy Pork or Grilled Shrimp topped with a fresh vegetable garnish and finished with our special house sauce, all served on a double warm corn tortilla. Try one of each to find your favorite! For a vegetarian option, we offer tofu.MexiCalbi would be more than happy to roll out one of our trucks to your home, place of business or special venue to serve hot made-to-order food for you and your guests.
name: MexiCalbi
